product.longDescription: The medium green leaves are unusually thick and crisp, so the head is sturdy and holds well. The large, well-packed heart has excellent butterhead quality. Slow to bottom rot. Intermediate resistance to lettuce mosaic virus. MT0-30. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 1,700 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.

Nancy Organic Pelleted Lettuce Seed

Product ID:438GP.11438GP

The medium green leaves are unusually thick and crisp, so the head is sturdy and holds well. The large, well-packed heart has excellent butterhead quality. Slow to bottom rot. Intermediate resistance to lettuce mosaic virus. MT0-30. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 1,700 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.
